projects.title: Global ServiceNow platform
projects.description: The objective of this multi-year program is to digitize and harmonize our service management processes and empower customers with proactive service from issue to resolution. This is planned to achieve by having a uniform IT service management single-domain, ServiceNow across Randstad global.

projects.title: Improving service management maturity
projects.description:
The objective of this program is to implement additional and optimize existing IT Service Management processes to the maturity level of at least ‘Quantitatively Managed’ (corresponding to at least level ‘4’), in accordance with the process maturity framework from CMMI-SVC.

My key responsibilities:
--------------------------
•	Organize and conduct working sessions with process leads to define the scope of deliverables
•	Conduct maturity assessments and find the gaps to define the scope
•	Ensure each deliverable follow the standard phases of process, design, implement and measurement
•	Bring in best practices from ITIL v3, ISO/IES 20000:2018 and CMMI-SVC by working with experts in the fields
•	Enable a self sufficient team (technology + process) to execute the program
•	Prepare program plan considering all dependencies and setup relevant tools to track deliverables/milestones
•	Coordinate with core team to prepare/review communication packs and kickoff decks
•	Work with communications manager to effective stakeholder and end user communications
•	Responsible for external partner coordinations, planning, managing risks and issues and define the program governance
•	First escalation point of contact for program schedule, scope, cost and resource deviations

projects.title: ServiceNow ITBM (now called as SPM) implementation and adoption
projects.description: The objective of this program is to implement and adopt ServiceNow ITBM (now SPM) for better management of the demands, project and portfolios. Insight in scope, budget and timelines is necessary to increase the efficiency and value of the projects delivered and provide information that can be used to improve the overall performance of project planning and execution.

projects.title: DevSecOps platform as a service
projects.description: The objective of this program is to build a microservices ecosystem to expose the back-end functionalities to the outside world and to leverage the global pipeline for the automation requirements. The microservices are deployed as pods in EKS with their own PaaS and SaaS components in AWS. The ecosystem includes Google & AWS API management services (Apigee edge & API gateway) & Splunk Observability.

projects.title: Global GCP Standardization
projects.description: The objective of this project is to achieve the standardized and secured Google Cloud Platform that matches with the standard of the existing Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform for Randstad globally. Standardize the GCP services, improve the security posture of the existing GCP environment and services, and define the guidelines to be considered while provisioning the services in future. Enhance the existing CI/CD pipeline, implementation of automated scripts and security including the log forwarding to Splunk for Google Cloud Platform.

projects.title: Onboard central infrastructure to CICD
projects.description: The objective of this project is to build a version controlled central repository and pipelines to build and deploy new environments for the core infrastructure services (Central Services) catering to the global AWS landscape of Randstad. This will help in building and deploying consistent environments in AWS and near  to zero touch operations which will help in reduction of manual errors.

projects.title: Branch Tablets and Records Management Programme
projects.description:
I managed two programs under Community Banking portfolio for Lloyds Banking Group as PM and Finance Lead. As a finance lead, I am worked with business finance teams for end to end finance activities like business case reviews, budget approvals, finance workbooks and day to day finance tracking for entire program. 
I also have good experience with Microsoft Project which I use for day to day activities of project planning and tracking. Being a PMO, I also handle all governance activities like scheduling, planning, RAIDs logging, risk analysis, staffing and allocation, status reporting and all other relevant tasks.
I am also champion for HIVE which is a collaboration platform based on JIVE.

projects.title: CID database migration
projects.description: CID (Credit Insurance Database) is currently hosted as MS Access DB with all the tables, forms and reports configured in the same system. The objective of this project is to convert the back-end to an approved relational database system as SQL Server and re-design entire front-end system as ASP.Net web application with SSRS reporting system.

projects.title: SLDM to EPICC interface bridge
projects.description: EPICC is a new data provisioning point for the bank which is based on Hadoop platform. EPICC controls the overall consumer section loans and SLDM is part of the same. The objective of this project is to create all the necessary data extracts, reports and automate the data transfer process thru NDM.

projects.title: SLDM ADS for Student Loans
projects.description: SLDM (Student Lending Data Mart) is a SQL Server based storage system for all the student loans information. The objective of this project is to make SLDM as the sole source of student loans information and decommission all other data flow channels from the third party vendors.

projects.title: Enterprise Data Movement Controls to SLDM
projects.description: EDM (Enterprise Data Management) is a primary wing of the bank that oversees of overall data movements across the organization. As an application that holds the critical data, SLDM should be in compliance with the EDM data movement controls and report back the journal.

projects.title: Student Lending Apps Monitoring System
projects.description: SLAMS (Student Lending Application Monitoring System) is C#.Net based windows application to help the Level 3 support team for regular monitor of files, data loading and other processing tasks from a single pane of application. This is a self-initiative project as part of innovation council.

projects.title: Sunset Legacy Student Lending Systems
projects.description: Legacy student lending systems are based on oracle and flat file systems. The objective is this project is to create a new SQL Server platform (SLDM) and migrate all the data/functionality from legacy systems.

projects.title: Group Banking CRM
projects.description: GBCRM is a web application based on Microsoft CRM Dynamics platform. The objective of this project is to build user interfaces for the relationship officers who work on field with the customers and the sales department.

publications.name: Resolving privacy and security concerns of IoT using FIPPs framework and IP based protocol

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading a large transformation program One ITSM for Randstad and its operating countries with potential 30% reduction in annual services spend and 40% cost efficiency in licenses and managed global services.
•	Spearheaded Global PPM tool (ServiceNow SPM (formerly ITBM)) implementation program for Randstad across 25+ portfolios
•	Leading service management processes improvement program by adopting ITIL v3 processes in accordance with ISO/IEC 20000:2018 standards
•	Working closely with ServiceNow enterprise account executives for SPM roadmap and enablement
•	Working closely with procurement teams and vendors for tools license model enhancements and professional services setup
•	Help initiating new programs with SOW and PID including resource capacity planning and effort estimation
•	Perform tasks central to program and project progress, including planning, scheduling, budgeting and resource management
•	Streamlined project management methodologies and Agile way of working along with Global PMO
•	Coaching and enabling project managers in agile way of working and project management principles
